# API Documentation

Welcome to the FlowGate API Documentation!

## Contents

### Command-Line Interface

- **[CLI Reference](cli.md)** - Complete CLI command reference

### Python API

- **Generated API Docs** - See `_generated/` directory (auto-generated by pdoc)

## Auto-Generated Documentation

API documentation is automatically generated from source code docstrings using `pdoc`.

### Generating Locally

```bash
# Install pdoc (development dependency)
uv sync --group dev

# Generate API documentation
uv run pdoc --html --output-dir docs/api/_generated src/flowgate

# View generated docs
open docs/api/_generated/flowgate/index.html
```

### CI/CD Integration

API documentation is automatically generated and published on every commit to `main` branch.

**Published Docs**: [GitHub Pages URL] (to be configured)
